page.title: 20A Day in the life of Wilbert
page.content: I wake up get dressed and head for the kitchen.I usually eat Kellogg's Cornflakes or Fruit n' Fibre. The clock in the living room strikes nine so I snatch my schoolbag,coat and fiddle and say goodbye to my mother.A mini_bus picks me up and takes me to school. School starts at 9.30am and finishes at 3.45pm.We have an hour for dinner at 12.30pm.Today for dinner we had fish,potatoes,tomato sauce and sweetcorn followed by fruit pie and custard. After school I watched television until 5.30pm when Craig came to pick me up to take me to Lerwick.We were going to rehearse for the Junior Fiddlers Society.We had chips before going home. At 11.15pm I had supper and went to bed.
